characters.story: "BEN!" he commands sharply, trying to differentiate, distinguish and recognize.
"BEN!" she commands sharply about the thread - make a braid, a plait for the twisted beard!
"BEE!" the flesh commands sharply - the arm, limb and shoulder!
"PEE!" the hot sauce and dagger sing cheerfully - to split, chop and cleave the mountain!
"PEE!" the words command sharply - make an analogy, a comparison and metaphor!
"PEE!" the person commands sharply about the out-of-the-way, remote and secluded alley!
"EE!" the words command sharply - to translate, interpret and convert!
"Zeh?" the fingers question curiously - which to select, choose and pick?
"Zeh?" the water questions curiously - is this a swamp, a marsh with aroma?
"DEN!" the clench and soil command sharply - use a pad, a cushion of newspaper for the pockets!
"GEEZ!" the clenched hand commands sharply - being earnest and sincere about this best friend!
"JOE!" the thread and cornucopia sing cheerfully, tangling to twist in a dispute!
"Ling?" the ice questions curiously - will you bully, insult and violate?
"Ling?" the flowers and minute ricemen question curiously - is this water caltrop, an aquatic nut?
"Ling?" the pinnacle and minute ricemen question curiously - is this a mausoleum, a tomb on a hill?
"Kuh?" the mouth and acorn question curiously - did you just cough, hack and wheeze?
"SHAH!" the sheaf, resin and saber sing cheerfully - to brake, stop and halt!
The mouth and pigeon coop bend down drooping - to cry out, shout and yell!
